About the Company: Balaji Telefilms Ltd is a media company and has a number of state-of the-art studios.They are a leading content provider in the television segment.The company occupies a dominant space in the television content creation space, with the top shows on Indian television to its credit. Currently they are producers of several leading serials on major channels like Star Plus, Sony TV, Zee TV , SUN TV network.etc.The company has also diversified by bringing in new teams for the motion pictures, internet and mobile space. Hoonur is their recently launched online portal for media professionals and entertainment consumers. The brand is used in the online and mobile space both for the entertainment portal and for user generated content..The company also in the business segment of Commissioned Programmes.
